Content.Text:
<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Flik, you're laaate! I'm all hungry now.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, Mora! I'll give you something deeee-lish
later, I promise.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? You promise? Yaaay!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, how'd your investigation here turn out?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Puh-pretty good. I found out that this area is
great for growing tea, fruit trees and even spice
plants! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh? That's some welcome news! Keep up the
good work.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Roger! ♪

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh...Flik? There's a human over there.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not to worry! We're invisible to humans,
remember? But we should move out of the way.
After all, they can still trip over us.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um... I think the human is following us, Flik.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't be preposterous. That was just a
coincidence. Let's go this way instead.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait... Can you see us?

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wowzers! I've never met a human who could see
us before!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie said they exist, but this is the first time
I've ever seen one.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello there, Human! I'm <BLUE>Flik</BLUE>, and this is <BLUE>Mora</BLUE>.
We're Nature Sprites.
<PAGE>
What's your name?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, is it? It's got an interesting ring to
it.
<PAGE>
I'm still surprised you're able to see us. Normally,
humans can't.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are we doing here, you say?
<PAGE>
Performing an investigation! Highly-detailed, of
course.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ayup. We're checking places to see what sorts
of crops and flowers grow best there.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I hate to chat and dash, but we've still
got other places to check out. Toodles!

<FACE_MORA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Huh-heeeey! Fliiiiik, wait for meeee! I'mma
comin'!

So, those are the Nature Sprites? They seemed
pretty lively for such a tiny bunch. I wonder if I'll
see them again...
